title: Carlota
content:
Hi guys,

A guy on a other forum ask me if I know a fonts called Carlota ?

Did this fonts exist ?

Thanks
author: Marc C

comments.content: Quick google research: It is a rip-off of the original [Carpenter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130220084505/http:/www.identifont.com/show?7YR).
Quick google research: It is a rip-off of the original [Carpenter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130220084505/http:/www.identifont.com/show?7YR). (If you made a typo in the name …)
